name: records
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool goverlytics.
Tool description: The Goverlytics API.
API description: Fetches records data from the Goverlytics API based on various optional filtering criteria.

limit.description: The maximum number of records to return. Defaults to None.

offset.description: The starting point in the list of records to return. Defaults to None.

substring.description: A substring to search for within the records. Defaults to None.

speaker_id.description: An ID representing a specific speaker. Defaults to None.

topic.description: The topic to filter records by. Defaults to None.

speaker_party.description: The party affiliation of the speaker to filter by. Defaults to None.

level_of_government.description: The level of government to filter records by. Defaults to None.

region.description: The region to filter records by. Defaults to None.
